item.title: docker postgresql
item.description: 创建容器 docker run -id --name=postgresql -v postgre-data:/var/lib/postgresql/data -p 5432:5432 -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=123456 -e LANG=C.UTF-8 postgres 进入 docker exec -it my-postgres psql -U postgres SELECT version(); create database test_db; CREATE TABLE test_table ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, age INTEGER ); INSERT INTO test_table (name, age) VALUES ('m', 30); SELECT * FROM test_table; nodejs测试 // 引入 'pg' 模块 const { Client } = require('pg'); // 设置数据库连接参数 const client = new Client({ user: 'postgres', host: 'localhost', database: 'test_db', password: '123456', port: 5432, }); // 连接到数据库 client.
